reviewText: I have watched three of the movies in this collection and enjoyed all of them.  Jason Statham is my kind  of actor and I really like the movies in this set.  If you enjoy watching Jason Statham in action, try this collection.
Family love Statham movies, very pleased with collection.
Its okay but its better to to watch crank 1and2 on tv
Love these movies and Jason Statham.
Lots of action for a great price, in one box.  Love Jason Statham.
Great action films...Plus, I love the Transporter series!

I really like Jason Statham as an actor; but this set of DVD movies was not what I expected. There is way too much foul language and lots of nudity and sex. I read the movies descriptions and of course they don't state the strong foolness.

Received the set and it's great except Crank 2 was defective and would not Play and after trying several attempts and different ways to get it to play, when it did open up there was a 4" x 4" picture so small you could not see the movie. I contacted Amazon and they gave me some money back and i re-ordered it with amazon through another venue and after 3 weeks when that one FINALLY came it was defective as well with the same problem.  So now it sits on the back seat of my car as I wonder what to do with it now ??  Sucks,,,

Five action flicks starring Jason Statham in one collection...can't beat that.  I thought The Mechanic was the best of the crop, in fact I purchased this set after getting and really enjoying the Mechanic II on DVD.  War and Transporter 3 were good action movies with great script, plot and action.  Crank and especially Crank 2 were a bit over the top.  I didn't know what to expect with these movies and was amazed.  They were both very entertaining with humor mixed with lots of blood and guts.  Made my head spin trying to follow the action.  I definitely recommend this collection for anyone seeking fast, high-octane entertainment.

Amazing quality for just DVDs, great price, comes with special features and comes with five great movies in a reliable case and DVD holders. Can't miss.
